source_setting.source: select     c.uuid, patent_id, description_text, description_length,  CONCAT(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '^[a-zA-Z]+'), LPAD(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '[0-9]+$'), 8-LENGTH(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '^[a-zA-Z]+')), '0')) as patent_zero_prefix, document_number from (select uuid from {elastic_production_source}.detail_desc_text where uuid > '{{offset}}' order by uuid limit {{limit}}) inner_q join {elastic_production_source}.detail_desc_text c on c.uuid=inner_q.uuid
